full_summary:
### Archaeological Services - Tulita, NWT

#### Solicitation Number:
5P420-23-0148/A

#### Publication Date:
September 20, 2023

#### Tender Closing Date:
October 19, 2023, 16:00:00

#### Expected Contract Start Date:
October 31, 2023

#### Expected Contract End Date:
November 30, 2024

#### Tender Status:
Expired

### Requisition Summary
Parks Canada is seeking a professional archaeological consultant to carry out an archaeological impact assessment (AIA) and mitigation. An optional monitoring service to address any accidental discovery of significant archaeological deposits will be included as part of the work if necessary.

### Contract Period
The contract period will be from the date of contract to March 31, 2024, inclusive. The contractor grants to Canada the irrevocable option to extend the term of the contract for an additional eight months from April 1, 2024 to November 30, 2024, inclusive under the same conditions.

### Contact Information
Daniel Nguyen is the contract authority contact for this opportunity. Please submit your questions, concerns and bids in writing to: daniel.nguyen@pc.gc.ca.

### Supports and Permission

* The Sahtu Dene and Metis Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement (1994) applies to this contract

### Important Notes

* Bid documents can be downloaded from Canada Bilingual (Canadabuys.Canada.ca)
* Official documents will only be accepted by email, fax or courier; no in-person submissions will be accepted.
* Please visit the [Canada Bilingual Website](http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities) for additional information on bidding process.

### Requirements

* Provide professional archaeological consulting services and conduct feasible studies with that regard to areas where affect potential & patience
* ensure how to move able daily working to every day uphold Intern
